chunks.text: NovaSure Insurance’s AutoGuard Pro roadside assistance plan includes a Temporary Hotel Stay Reimbursement benefit. This provision supports customers who experience a qualifying vehicle breakdown more than 100km from their registered home and between the hours of 10:00 PM and 4:00 AM. The purpose is to ensure customer safety when travel cannot reasonably continue overnight.

To request reimbursement, policyholders must submit the following within 14 days of the incident:

Description of the breakdown (with time and location).

Original hotel invoice with guest name and nightly rate.

Proof of distance (e.g., roadside assistance report or GPS data).

If the hotel was not booked through NovaSure’s partners, a short written explanation may be required.

In cases where the initial breakdown assistance was handled through NovaSure’s digital assistant Lina, customers may submit their reimbursement claim within 7 calendar days via Lina. No additional data expect for the invoice needed in that case, as Lina has already saved all information.

This hotel reimbursement benefit is exclusive to AutoGuard Pro policyholders. It is not available under AutoGuard Basic, Plus, or Standard tiers. Always refer to the latest policy booklet for updates, as terms are subject to change.
The policy includes coverage of up to 160€ per night.
Costs of public transportation, taxi or ride-sharing services are included in the policy and can be reimbursed aswell.

Reimbursement eligibility requires the insured vehicle to be over 100 kilometers away from the policyholder’s primary residence at the time of immobilization. NovaSure verifies this using GPS data from service logs or through documentation like repair intake forms. The policyholder’s home address must be up to date in NovaSure’s system.

Reimbursement claims may be denied under the following conditions:

Policy activated less than 48 hours prior to the incident.

Incident occurred within 100km of the policyholder’s home.

Evidence of fraud, misuse, or non-emergency use of service.

Reasonable travel alternatives were available at the time.

NovaSure will reimburse up to €160.00 per night for hotel stays meeting all eligibility criteria. Only one night per incident is covered unless prior approval is granted. The hotel must be a licensed commercial establishment—private stays or short-term rentals like Airbnb are excluded. Meals, entertainment, parking, and additional charges are not covered.
Costs of public transportation, taxi or ride-sharing services are included in the policy and can be reimbursed aswell.

The hotel benefit only applies when the covered breakdown occurs between 10:00 PM and 4:00 AM local time. The time of the incident is based on the timestamp of the roadside assistance request, as recorded by NovaSure’s hotline or Nova Assist app.
